name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Allan Dale BUYNA, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Allan Dale BUYNA, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John H. Corbett, Jr., Chief, Appellate Div., David G. Metinko, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Kemal Alexander Mericli, Sara A. DeCourcy, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee!
casebody.head_matter:
442 A.2d 694
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Allan Dale BUYNA, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 4, 1982.
Decided April 2, 1982.
John H. Corbett, Jr., Chief, Appellate Div., David G. Metinko, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Kemal Alexander Mericli, Sara A. DeCourcy, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee!
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
